measurements.description: Thirty-seven very small flowers and nine buds on seven mature and three juvenile infloresences between 3.8 to 4.0cm long; plant 42.5cm high by 48.9cm wide, 44 slender upright bamboo-like growths, leaves lancolate, well separated along slender growths, leaves average 11.2cm by 1.2cm, grown in bark and perlite, 14-cm plastic pot; sepals and petals magenta; lip u-shaped, fringed, white overlaid magenta distally, two red blotches centrally; column white overlaid magenta, two black dots at tip; substance hard; texture matte; spent flower bracts green.
